content.question: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes. Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Assess the extent to which the economic and political ideals of Karl Marx were realized in postrevolutionary Russia in the period from 1917 to 1939.

topic.text: 6.7: Ideologies of Change and Reform Movements

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
